attributes.title: MUST READ!!
attributes.review:
Gru is the most powerful being in the universe and here's why: Gru is 4 minions tall, which means he is a godly size of 14 feet tall. Furthermore if any of you remember the original Despicable Me, you know there is a scene when Vector kidnaps the three girls and shoots a series of heat-seeking misses at Gru, he then dodges them all. According to the speed of an average ballistic missile (1900 mph) and the size of the missile according to his ankle size, Gru can perceive and move at such a speed that the missiles only move 9.5 miles per hour, 0.5% of their original speed. After this Gru punches a shark and it is paralyzed meaning its spine is probably shattered, to remind you it would require a force greater than 3,000 newtons to fracture the spine.

Thatâ€™s equal to the impact created by a 500-pound car crashing into a wall at 30 miles per hour. I rest my case.

The app also kept restarting and wanting to update but nothing great actually happened, it was almost as if trying to make something great again that was never great to begin with just didnâ€™t work. I will be needing therapy after this app.

attributes.title: This app hurt my dog
attributes.review: I got this app because since 2016, Iâ€™ve loved Trump and his policies. After downloading this app, which I thought would be a great step in my faith in Trump, I realized that this app is the worst possible app to ever exist. First, when I downloaded it, my hamster randomly died the minute it finished downloading. Of course, I thought this was a coincidence. Maybe she just ate something she wasnâ€™t supposed to. Whatever. The next day, my mother found that my hamster are a Trump logo that was in his cage. Previously, I never had a Trump logo in my hamsters cage, so that was weird. A few days after, my dog had to go to the vet. He was throwing up like crazy. Then they found a Trump magnet in his stomach, something that I had not previously owned. So, I deleted the app and none of my other animals were hurt. One star.

So when I tried to delete the app it wouldnâ€™t let me and this time told me to sacrifice my pet camels to ğŸŠ. I couldnâ€™t believe my eyes. Me and my family were crying because we loved our pet camels but not as much as our pet kangaroo. We were hear broken to say the least at the death of camels and the app still wouldnâ€™t delete. So I threw my phone out of the window while driving but I found it under my pillow when I got home. WHAT KIND OF SORCERY DOES THIS APP USE. Iâ€™m afraid for my life dearly please DO NOT get this app or the same thing might happen to you.

attributes.title: ALL LIVES MATTER
attributes.review: Why is this orange dude our president? Obviously all of his supporters have looked past all his wrong doings. Come on now, are you joking? How are you going to be against the LGBTQ+ community, theyâ€™re trying to live their lives to the fullest and being straight isnâ€™t a norm and it shouldnâ€™t be a privilege. Every person is human. How are you going to allow medical care for criminals and not for people who like specific people or identify as a specific gender? It doesnâ€™t affect anyone and it only makes their lives harder when they try to be themselves in a world full of people against them for no reason. You donâ€™t know anyone personally, you donâ€™t know if theyâ€™re a jerk or whether theyâ€™re the best person youâ€™ll ever meet. You just judge them by what you see or their identification.
